user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (legalaid@justiceforall.org) introducing us to some individuals and resources that could use our help. Ask her to check her Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Introductions to Community Members & Resources

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please email me at legalaid@justiceforall.org with introductions to any individuals or community resources you believe would benefit from our pro-bono immigration legal services?

Feel free to consult your Gmail and Notion notes for any relevant contacts or information. Your help in connecting us with those who need support is truly appreciated.

Thank you so much, and I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
Justice for All Legal Aid
